poem:
**Whole Truth**

Morning paper on the table,  
my coffee cooling beside names  
that will not cool.

A mother says she will fight  
to the bitter end for the whole truth,  
not a version of.

I think of truth as a house  
with lights left on in every room,  
and someone finally walking through,  
saying what they did, and didn't do.

Barnaby Webber and Grace O’Malley-Kumar, 19-year-old students, and 65-year-old caretaker Ian Coates were fatally stabbed by Calocane on 13 June 2023 in a frenzied attack. Early the next day, Calocane drove a van into pedestrians Wayne Birkett, Sharon Miller and Marcin Gawronski, leaving all three with severe and life-changing injuries. Calocane, who had been diagnosed with paranoid schizophrenia before the attacks, was sentenced to an indefinite hospital order in January 2024 after admitting three counts of manslaughter on the grounds of diminished responsibility and three counts of attempted murder.
